name: route-fs
description: A easy way to organize your routers.Say goodbye to writing route list by hand, just proxy to file system.

scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-ci-2: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: karboom
